creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: four big, bold characters, one in each quadrant; rectangular intaglio stamp URC
inscription: In all cases I want to scratch where the ancients itched. (SA)
markings: LLC, two square intaglio; on back, center, in pencil: [Goga]; on back, LRC, in pencil, in Japanese
title: Set of Three Poem Cards (shikishi), one of three
